data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Dera Ghazi Khan.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dera Ghazi Khan, Punjab, Pakistan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Dera Ghazi Khan access to a Bible in their own language.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 358 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Over 98.72 percent of the people of Dera Ghazi Khan are far from Jesus.
Spirit, teach the 1,113 believers in the county of Dera Ghazi Khan the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Dera Ghazi Khan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Dera Ghazi Khan, Punjab, Pakistan.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 1,113 believers in Dera Ghazi Khan, Punjab, Pakistan to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.
